nodes.text: A Felucian fern was a plant native to the planet Felucia, a type of fern. It possessed blue-green fronds.

In approximately 40 BBY, Qui-Gon Jinn visited the Jedi temple arboretum and encountered one of these plants. He stroked two fingers along its fronds and they sprung back slightly at the touch, showing the plant's sensitivity and health. He then used the Force to touch its consciousness and found its presence to be a delicate thing, conscious of nothing but peace.
